info.document:
Sept 16 (Reuters) - Authorities may have to issue tropical
storm alerts along parts of the  U.S. east coast on Saturday as
Hurricane Jose moves northwest, the National Hurricane Center
said.
Hurricane Jose, a Category 1 storm, was about 515 miles (830
km) southwest of Bermuda with winds of 80 mph (130 kph), the
center said.
The storm was forecast to turn north with a slight decrease
in forward speed later on Saturday, the center said.
(Reporting by Brendan O'Brien in Milwaukee)
